standard.name: Standard
standard.description: The standard ruleset for all official singles battles.

standarddoubles.name: Standard Doubles
standarddoubles.description: The standard ruleset for all official doubles battles.

abilityclause.name: Ability Clause
abilityclause.description: Prevents teams from having more than a given number of Mons with the same ability.
abilityclause.rule_log: {} Ability Clause: Limit {} of each ability

accuracymovesclause.name: Accuracy Moves Clause
accuracymovesclause.description: Bans moves that have a chance to lower the target's accuracy.
accuracymovesclause.rule_log: Accuracy Moves Clause: Accuracy-lowering moves are banned

endlessbattleclause.name: Endless Battle Clause
endlessbattleclause.description: Prevents players from forcing a battle which their opponent cannot end except by forfeit.
endlessbattleclause.rule_log: Endless Battle Clause: Forcing endless battles is banned

evasionclause.name: Evasion Clause
evasionclause.description: Bans abilities, items, and moves that boost evasion.
evasionclause.rule_log: Evasion Clause: Evasion abilities, items, and moves are banned

evasionabilitiesclause.name: Evasion Abilities Clause
evasionabilitiesclause.description: Bans abilities, items, and moves that boost evasion.
evasionabilitiesclause.rule_log: Evasion Abilities Clause: Evasion abilities are banned

evasionitemsclause.name: Evasion Items Clause
evasionitemsclause.description: Bans abilities, items, and moves that boost evasion.
evasionitemsclause.rule_log: Evasion Items Clause: Evasion items are banned

evasionmovesclause.name: Evasion Moves Clause
evasionmovesclause.description: Bans abilities, items, and moves that boost evasion.
evasionmovesclause.rule_log: Evasion Moves Clause: Evasion moves are banned

forcemonotype.name: Force Mono Type
forcemonotype.description: Forces all teams to have the same type.

itemclause.name: Item Clause
itemclause.description: Prevents teams from having more than one Mon with the same item.
itemclause.rule_log: Item Clause: Limit one of each item

nicknameclause.name: Nickname Clause
nicknameclause.description: Prevents teams from having more than one Mon with the same nickname.

ohkoclause.name: OHKO Clause
ohkoclause.rule_log: OHKO Clause: OHKO moves are banned

onevsone.name: One vs One
onevsone.description: Only allows one Mon per player.

sametypeclause.name: Same Type Clause
sametypeclause.description: Forces all Mons on a team to share a type with each other.
sametypeclause.rule_log: Same Type Clause: Mons in a team must share a type

sleepclause.name: Sleep Clause
sleepclause.description: Prevents players from putting more than one of their opponent's Mons to sleep at a time.
sleepclause.rule_log: Sleep Clause: Limit one foe put to sleep

sleepmovesclause.name: Sleep Moves Clause
sleepmovesclause.description: Bans all moves that induce sleep.
sleepmovesclause.rule_log: Sleep Moves Clause: Sleep-inducing moves are banned

teampreview.name: Team Preview
teampreview.description: Allows each player to see all Mons before they choose their lead Mon.

twovstwo.name: Two vs Two
twovstwo.description: Only allows two Mons per player.

speciesclause.name: Species Clause
speciesclause.description: Prevents teams from having more than one Mon from the same species.
speciesclause.rule_log: Item Clause: Limit one of each Mon

playersperside.name: Players Per Side
playersperside.description: The number of players per side.

adjustleveldown.name: Adjust Level Down
adjustleveldown.description: Sets Mons above this level down to this level.

evlimit.name: EV Limit
evlimit.description: Maximum total EVs on each Mon.

maxmovecount.name: Max Move Count
maxmovecount.description: Maximum number of moves allowed on a single Mon.

maxteamsize.name: Max Team Size
maxteamsize.description: Maximum team size that can be brought into Team Preview (or into the battle if Team Preview is not used).

minteamsize.name: Min Team Size
minteamsize.description: Minimum team size that can be brought into Team Preview (or into the battle if Team Preview is not used).

pickedteamsize.name: Picked Team Size
pickedteamsize.description: Team size that can be brought out of Team Preview.
